name: Steal the thing
description: Important: You start in a elevator so you need to click on the doors to open it if you are stuck. The pink ball is a test for turning off the lights as you will need them off to steal an object in the final game. The gold pill is a test for the special object you will be trying to steal which will set a bool on or off. I will be making a bigger space/environment for the scene My goal for my adventure game is to make a game where you are trying to steal something and it has a talking mechanic where you can learn/get information.
